post.html:
There is a tremendous variety of pretend play toys in Taiwanâ€™s market, however, the customers are disappointed because of a lack of choice which demonstrates the Taiwanese lifestyle they are familiar with. The lifestyle in Taiwan has its own uniqueness, and it is worthy to be cherished. We aim to make mumu a hub which connects the collective memory of families through play.

Do you remember your childhood friends ?

Furniture and food

Dollhouse

Good flexibility of house structure brings joy to play All pillars, floor boards, door, stairs are free for children to build.

Considerable design for limited indoor space

Dolls

Play with Mumu!

Client: Mumu Studio Year: 2016 Design: Yen-Tsen Liu Photography: Jun-You Liu
